name: Cubes (itch) (imperfect_wizard)
description: Cubes is 2d game in which your aim is to  collect points and get a Highscore ,but it's not as simple as it looks, there are some coins which give you points but some ends your game when you collide with them, same is the case  with obstacles, some ends your game while some gives you points. So try to  get a good  Highscore and Enjoy.
